name: Meet Emi
description:
Meet the new girl, Emi! Introduce who you are, share interests, and have lots of fun!

This is a passion project made by Lolo Games inspired by these amazing games: Doki Doki Literature Club, Fun Times with Ayumi, Cooking Companions, and Lily's Well!


Links
  • Play Now
  • Updates
  • Discord

1280x720p is required for this game to function properly until a compatibility port has been implemented.

We are NOT liable/responsible for any suicidal thoughts, trauma, or ptsd this game may bring.
